Lde/ecspride/FieldSensitivity2;->onCreat: The method retrieves the SIM serial number via getSystemService and getSimSerialNumber, storing it in a Datacontainer object. The SIM serial number is not passed to any sink. The sendTextMessage method (part of android.telephony) is called but does not transmit sensitive data as it uses hardcoded values. No sink for user data is identified.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;->getDescript: The method retrieves the description field from the Datacontainer object, which was previously populated with the SIM serial number. No sensitive data is passed to sinks or further methods. The data is only returned as a string without any transmission or storage operations.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;->setDescript: The method sets the 'description' field of a Datacontainer object using the input parameter. No sensitive data is originated here. The input data (description) is stored in an instance field but not passed to any sinks or further methods. No method invocations are present, and no sink operations are identified.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;-><init>:()V: No sensitive data operations were observed in this method related to its own originations. The method only performs object initialization without handling or propagating any user data.
